text: This is a List of FIA Formula 2 Championship drivers, that is, a list of drivers who have made at least one race start in the FIA Formula 2 Championship, which was established in 2017. This list is accurate up to and including the of the 2020 FIA Formula 2 Championship. ==By name== {| class="wikitable" |- |+ Key |- !scope=col|Symbol !scope=col|Meaning |- | style="background: #CCCCFF;" | * | Driver competed in the |- | style="background: #FFFF99;" | ~ | Driver competed in the last Formula One race (the ) |- | style="background: #ccffcc;" | ^ | Driver has competed in Formula One but not the last race |} {|class="wikitable sortable" style="font- size: 85%; text-align:center" !
